arts.ttl: Linssen steers NEC to victory over RKC
arts.sum: A 92nd minute winner from Bryan Linssen ensured NEC Nijmegen defeated RKC Waalwijk 2-1. NEC went into the game just above the bottom three and desperate for a win. The first half was a poor affair with neither side really coming close to opening the scoring. Early in the second half, Kodai Sano put NEC […] The post Linssen steers NEC to victory over RKC appeared first on Football Oranje.

arts.ttl: NEC Nijmegen v RCK Waalwijk Preview: Waalwijk looking to boost Eredivisie survival chances
arts.sum: RKC Waalwijk travel to NEC Nijmegen in the Eredivisie on Friday evening hoping to reduce the gap to Willem II and the relegation play-off spot. The side are currently just…

arts.ttl: Preview: NEC vs. RKC Waalwijk - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Friday's Eredivisie clash between NEC and RKC Waalwijk, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
